biotools.summary: It is a global entry point to information and knowledge for strengthening the capacity for PGRFA conservation, management and utilization. The site is managed by the FAO Secretariat of the International Treaty on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (ITPGRFA). It provides access to accessions of ex situ and in situ plant material available in decentralized collections through the use of DOIs assigned to plant material.

bioschemas.name: Global Information System on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (GLIS)
